alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 28 at 9:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Colorado, including the following areas, Eastern Kiowa County, Lamar Vicinity/Prowers County, Las Animas Vicinity/Bent County, Springfield Vicinity/Baca County and Western Kiowa County. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Monsoon moisture and upslope flow will trigger showers and thunderstorms across the southeast plains into the overnight hours. Very heavy rainfall will be possible which could cause localized flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County
